mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, total_amount, status, recipient_name, recipient_phone, recipient_address, created_time, updated_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, #{recipientName}, #{recipientPhone}, #{recipientAddress}, now(), now());
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, total_amount, status, recipient_name, recipient_phone, recipient_address, created_time, updated_time FROM orders WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status}, updated_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.user_id, DATE_FORMAT(o.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_time, o.recipient_address, o.recipient_phone, o.total_amount, o.status FROM orders o ORDER BY o.created_time DESC
